assignments.label: set available definitions equal to collection

assignments.label: Set beneficiary team to requestor team

assignments.label: set final ticket definitions equal to collection

assignments.name: Set_some_fields_from_scoping_section
assignments.label: Set some fields from scoping section

formulas.name: due_days_formatted_text
formulas.expression: IF( {!days_until_due}=0, ":exclamation: due today", IF( {!days_until_due}<0, ":exclamation: due "&TEXT({!days_until_due}*-1)&" days ago", "due in "&TEXT({!days_until_due})&" days" ) )

fields.name: deal_desk_header
fields.fieldText: Deal Desk: RevOps Link

fields.name: Copy_requestor_manager
fields.helpText: Check this box to notify the requestor's manager when this ticket is created and whenever the ticket's status changes.

fields.name: short_name
fields.helpText: Describe the ask in 50 characters or less

fields.name: Sensitivity
fields.helpText:
Private: Only the ticket requestor and owner can see the ticket.

Exec: Private + department heads

Variable Comp: Private + selected executives + accounting team + variable compensation lead

Accounting: Private + Exec + accounting team

Managers: Private + all people managers

Public: Everyone can see the ticket


IMPORTANT:

  • All ticket details are generally available to most Revenue Operations team members.
  • Anyone in your reporting line can see tickets you can see

fields.name: Priority_Level
fields.helpText:
P0 (Critical): Core business function is down and all work stops, until this issue is resolved.

P1 (High): Required to unblock other teams or core business processes

P2 (Medium): Ordinary flow of work

P3 (Low): Nice to have; not required

P4 (Backlog): Not prioritized; informational

fields.name: due_date
fields.helpText: By what date do you need this work to be completed?

validationRule.errorMessage: Due date must be in the future

fields.name: blockers
fields.fieldText: [Blockers]: Are there any blockers to successful resolution that we should be aware of?

value.stringValue: [Doc Link]: Provide a link to a related Google doc (can add later)

fields.name: Functional_Tags
fields.fieldText: [Functional Tags]: Themes and topics for this ticket

fields.name: size
fields.helpText:
Should reflect the amount of effort to complete a ticket. It is not a direct measure of time, but likely correlates to time. A combination of;

  • Size of change
  • Complexity (number of dependencies, number of stakeholders, …)
  • Inherent uncertainty


Point Definitions

0.1 = Minutes | No Dependencies | Everything is known about the task

1 = Hours | | No Dependencies | Everything is known about the task

2 = Half a day | Few Dependencies | Most is known about the task

3 = Full day | Some Dependencies | Most is known about the task

5 = A couple of day | Some/Many Dependencies | A little is known about the task

8 = Week or more

fields.name: Error_ticket_def_id
fields.fieldText: Error: Provided ticket definition ID ({!ticket_definition_id}) not found.

fields.name: beneficiary_teams
fields.fieldText: Which teams will benefit from the successful resolution of this ticket?

fields.name: systems_impacted
fields.fieldText: Please select the system(s) that are related to this ticket (select all that apply)

value.stringValue: Please select the choice that most aligns with the area where you need help:
Subtype__c:Subtype , Routing_Description__c:Select if you need help with...
Please select the type of ticket that you want to file:

fields.name: sucess_header
fields.fieldText:
Success: You have successfully created the following ticket:


{!Get_new_ticket.Name}

fields.name: Tickets_Frozen
fields.fieldText:
GTM Ticket submission is temporarily frozen for the following reason:


{!Get_global_permission.Reason__c}


Please try again later.
